pages.text: $(li)The Clay block can be found underwater in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/river)Rivers$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l) over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This block can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:decoration/supplementaries/statue)Statue$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)You can obtain $(l)Terracota$() if you smelt thing block in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you dig this block you will obtain $(l)Clay Balls$().

$(li)The Clay Ball is a maleable material that can be used to craft $(l)Clay Lump$(), $(l)Clay$() and $(l)Daub$().$(br)$(li)You can make $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/brick)Bricks$(/l) smelting this item in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/mason)Masons$(/l) will exchange Clay Balls by your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).
